column5: I know they have a sale this time of year.  Anyone know what week the no tax deal falls on?  I couldnt find anything on there web site.
I know there is 1 guy that works @ the Markham Location that's a member here...  hopefully he can put some insight?... Forgot his OFC Handle though
Not too sure either....I just received the catalogue and nothing was mentioned, that I could find anyway.
They had a no tax sale during the same time as the Fishing and Boat show.
They had one a couple of weeks ago in Ottawa......
They had a Valentines No Tax sale weekend from Feb 11-14 I think.  Not sure when the next one will be.
They typically have a booth at the Sportsman show and it is no-tax. I believe that they have the same deal on at the store at the same time. Jim

Hey guys...I'm no longer working at Le Baron (I'm the guy A2F was thinking of).  But, I talked to one of the guys there, and they SHOULD be having a no tax sale, plus the members discount (if you are a member) during the days of the Sportsmen's Show.
